Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that a Nigerian man was buried in a $90,000 BMW.
Falters at times: The claim falters as it is based on a Facebook post and subsequent reports that have been contradicted by actors claiming it was a movie set.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the picture and narrative shared on social media and news outlets accurately depict a real burial, without considering alternative explanations.
Exist alternative explanation: The actors' comments suggest an alternative explanation that the picture was taken on a movie set, rather than depicting an actual burial.
Understate: The claim may understate the level of skepticism and questioning raised by some commenters and actors regarding the authenticity of the burial.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the picture was taken on a movie set, as indicated by the comments from actors involved in the film.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the significance and truthfulness of the burial, as it is based on a single picture and subsequent reports that have been called into question.
